short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to help people get relocated with a job

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for job opportunities can be overwhelming, especially if you're looking to relocate. That's where this chrome extension comes in. This extension offers a simple solution that highlights job posts on LinkedIn that support relocation, making it easy for you to identify relevant opportunities quickly.

But that's not all. This extension also regularly updates its database of jobs and companies, ensuring that you have access to the most up-to-date information. This means that you'll always have the latest information on job openings, helping you stay ahead of the competition.

Plus, there's a dedicated contact email where you can submit any queries or issues you might have. Our team is committed to helping you every step of the way, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

This is just the first version of the extension, and there are exciting plans for the future. The team behind this extension is constantly working to improve its functionality and add new features, with the goal of helping you find the perfect job to advance your career.
